channel.title: Blog on Aswin Karthik's Personal site
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Aswin Karthik's Personal site

item.title: Setting up this Blog
item.description: I wanted to do a small write up on how I set this blog up. This blog uses hugo to generate content. Things to note about Hugo: It is a static site generator. Themes are easily pluggable. Content can be written as markdown files. Steps 1. Github Repository Create a repository to host all your content. This is where you will be maintaining markdown files. So I created https://github.
